name: Cigarillo Sumatra
additionalNotes:
The Irish are bringing their knowledge of superb pipe tobaccos and collector’s grade pipes to bear on producing cigarillos.

Teaming with the Villiger family of Switzerland who have been producing cigarillos for three generations, O’Dowd, the famed Irish manufacturer, has developed a state-of-the-art cigarillo factory devoted to the artistry of Picasso.
